ovdesc.p: This application is similar to SEAT.RESULTS and is used by the client as a reference to check against the SEAT.RESULTS application.

desc.p: Number of jBASE instructions (total). No input field.

This field will display the name of subroutines that get called during transaction processing. Any subroutine that is invoked when the transaction is input, committed, authorized, reversed or deleted will be recorded and displayed in this field. Multi value and No input field.
Execute statements encountered . No input field.
Contains the Expected result . No input field.
It denotes the system date. No input field.
It denotes the system time. No input field.
Result of individual test done by each SEAT routine. 0-succes, Any value not equal to 0 indicates Failure. No input field.
Id of SEAT record for functionality testing. No input field.
Writes without locks . No input field.
Total number of reads, writes, deletes are summed up in this field etc.No input field.
Contains the T24 Release . No input field.
Contains the Script.Id. No-input Field.
The Test id can have a maximum of 45 alpha - numeric characters.
Total elapsed time of ‘transaction’. No input field
Contains the Reason for failure . No input field
The total number of calls made to any subroutines as a result of the current transaction process will be displayed in this field. No input field.
Total pathlength of transaction – number of jBASE instructions processed. No input field
Elapsed time spent (total). No input field.
Contains the Actual updated result. No input field.
Name of application or job name . No input field.
Contains the transaction id. No input field.
If the environment encounters a core dump during any process with the SEAT switched on, then that will be recorded in this field.
Result of all tests done by all the test routines . 0-Success, Any value not equal to 0 indicates Failure . No input field.
Input output operations like read,write,delete etc., are summed up in this field. No input field.
Number of times called. Is incremented for every call count . No input field.
Number of reads per file. No input field
Function performed. Like Input, Authorise . No input field.
